snippet.title: Benny Bash - Uncover the secrets of a cursed video game while a malevolent entity hunts you!
snippet.description:
Download the demo on itch.io https://eduardscarpato.itch.io/benny-bash-demo?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt You are trapped in a wooden cabin with only a strange game from the '80s to play. You must obey the entity behind it, or he will kill you.

Survive this horror/puzzle adventure. Uncover the secrets of a cursed video game from the '80s while a malevolent entity hunts you. Solve escape room-style puzzles, navigate eerie labyrinths, and see how your actions in the game shape the real world. Stay sharp... and stay alive!

➡️ More from Eduardo Scarpato https://eduardscarpato.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
